comments:
Build 20020214

I was in the Java perspective.
I had 'split' my editor area by dragging an editor out of the tab group and 
inserting it underneath the tab group.  When I tried to close the editor in the 
lower half of the tab group the attached exception occurred.

At this point I was forced to shutdown Eclipse to try to restore UI 
functionality.

When I restarted Eclipse, no editors were open, but the editor area still had a 
visible split in it.  I opened an editor and it filled the top half of the 
area.  I then tried to drag the editor into the lower half, at which point it 
expanded to fill the whole area.

Now I'm unable to repeat the problem.
